description: As Jordan Evans calmly sips his wine on the veranda awaiting his guest, he takes in the majesty and beauty of the estate resort he's created. Jordan puts his hands above his head, grinding and riding Arad's cock until he's ready to explode, which he does all over himself as Arad simultaneously blasts him with a healthy load of his own. 'Quite the rewards program your resort has,' Arad thinks to himself as he quivers in the aftermath.Enjoy!
title: First Resort
